subSections.title: Readings
Notes
subSections.text:
* As in historical readings "ずゐ", "つゐ", "ゆゐ", and "るゐ", most dictionaries do not have "すゐ" as a historical reading for 酔. According to historical data, its on-reading is the modern "すい". However, the Dai Kanwa Jiten, has the "すゐ" and related -wi historical on-readings.
{{attention|ja|please confirm this, this is translated from the Japanese Wikipedia}}
